item.title: Framework Desktop Review: A Delightful Surprise
item.description: While it’s not as revolutionary as the Framework Laptop, the Framework Desktop manages to combine a worthwhile balance of performance, upgradability, and size.

item.title: Framework Desktop Review: A Delightful Surprise
